name: Polyfield WW2
description: Polyfield WW2 is the Online First-Person Shooter game that describes the World War 2. In Polyfield WW2, you can choose the Axis and Allied side, and you can see and experience how destructive the war !AxisStates governed by a fascist regime and unable to obtain what they want in the First World War.AlliesThe allied states, which are defending against axes, have emerged with the war of England and France in Germany.
